auth.heading: Managing Hotel is Now Easy
auth.reset_password_message: Don't worry! Just fill in your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.confirm_mail_message: Note: Confirmation mail is usually present in spam.
auth.resend_password_message: We’ve sent you an email that contains a link to reset your password.
auth.resend_password_confirmation_message: Please check your spam inbox if you can’t find the mail. If you still can’t find it, we can resend it.
auth.reset_password_info: Enter below details to reset password.
